message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I am proposing a purchase price of $950,000 for this exceptional item.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $950,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your interest in our product. After reviewing your offer, I am willing to consider $875,000 as a counteroffer for the product.
